document_data.name: Beldora
document_data.mainbody: '''Beldora''' was a secret [[Harper]] agent in [[Bryn Shander]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Beldora, posing as a homeless waif, gained coins by helping to tend other folk's campfires. Secretly, she listened to all conversations around the fires and — thanks to a ''[[sending stones|sending stone]]'' — once a day reported the relevant ones to her contact [[Thwip Ironbottom]] of [[Hundelstone]].
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], Beldora was at the marketplace when [[giant]]s attacked the city.
document_data.Personality: Beldora liked to tell lies to people, believing that this made life more interesting. However, she wanted to protect poor people.
